title: Data Extraction From Tobacco Product Planogram
snippet:
I need data extraction from pictures of in-store tobacco product planogram to excel (Format Provided). Deadline is 9pm 31st October GMT +8 Singapore.

Information to be extracted are:
1. Out Of Shelf Incidences (Broken down into individual product SKU & Manufacturer)
2. Incidents of Missing Price Stickers (Broken down into individual product SKU & Manufacturer)
3. Price Accuracy Check (Broken down into individual product SKU & Manufacturer)
4. Total Number Of Out Of Shelf Incidents
5. Total Number Of SKUs Displayed

Will take roughly 10mins to complete one entry. I will require you to complete 150 entries (150 stores). 

Data format is attached. Please let me know if you have any questions.
